Died

Section: Item Display

DIED,

At Windham on Saturday last, Mr. Shubael Fitch, aged 84.

At Chaplin, suddenly, on the 27
th ult. Mrs. Freelove Geer, wife of Mr. Amos Geer, aged 71 years.
